subject: Economy
question_en: What is the primary objective of the Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)?
question_hi: महात्मा गांधी राज्य उत्तराधिकारी (MGNREGA) ke pradhan objective ka matlab?
A_en: To provide temporary employment to rural population during lean seasons
A_hi: राज्य के राष्ट्रीय उत्तराधिकारी (MGNREGA) ka pradhan objective ka matlab ?
B_en: To promote financial inclusion in rural areas
B_hi: राज्य के राष्ट्रीय उत्तराधिकारी (MGNREGA) ka pradhan objective ka matlab ?

D_en: To improve agricultural productivity and rural income

E_en: To control inflation and stabilize the economy
E_hi: राज्य के राष्ट्रीय उत्तराधिकारी (MGNREGA) ka pradhan objective ka matlab ?
F_en: To promote entrepreneurship and self-employment in rural areas
F_hi: राज्य के राष्ट्रीय उत्तराधिकारी (MGNREGA) ka pradhan objective ka matlab ?
G_en: To increase tax revenue and improve government finances

I_en: To reduce unemployment and provide employment opportunities
I_hi: राज्य के राष्ट्रीय उत्तराधिकारी (MGNREGA) ka pradhan objective ka matlab ?
J_en: To develop infrastructure in rural areas
J_hi: राज्य के राष्ट्रीय उत्तराधिकारी (MGNREGA) ka pradhan objective ka matlab ?

L_en: To enhance agricultural productivity and rural development
